comments.body:
It appears there is a similar post on this idea already being talked about! Help your ideas make it into Minecraft and join existing threads in progress, even if your idea isn't an exact match - we read ALL the comments. Thank you for putting your time and energy into this post. Players like yourself help drive forward the creative boundaries of Minecraft for our community. Don't forget to upvote good comments! 

Making Great Searches:https://feedback.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360035667771-Making-Great-Searches-on-the-Feedback-Site-

in my opinion they should add a new level red fortress with the last boss of the wither can have two phases and the arena is strange because on basalt deltas platforms you have to go through all leveles to get to this level and the wither is to be released to the normal world but the hero must save our world and add a teacher.

Yes but, who made the wither? if the piglins did, then why did the orb not control them when they touched it? 

This is probably the reason
There all ready is a nether fortress level.
Pich
Pitch
Pich

Ran out of room.

Level 3 - O.S.S (Outer Space Station) - Pt. 2

  • As your pod docks into the O.S.S, you are ambushed by tons of mutant Astro-zombies.
  • Make your way through the O.S.S (Which is practically a maze), to get to the boss.
  • Boss: Horrific Hixeospue (Here's how you say it: Hix-e-o-spew)

Boss - Horrific Hixeospue

Phase 1:

  • Attack 1 - Laser Beams
  • Summons Mutant Mobs

Phase 2:

  • The arena detaches from the O.S.S and Hixeospue expands the arena so you have to wait for when he runs out of energy, then use the floating pistons to bounce around and attack him for as long as you can before he is back into the battle.
  • Laser Beams, but they deal twice the damage.
  • Summons 3 times the mutant mobs with some Aliens.
  • Aliens - Shoots laser beams at you.

After you defeat Hixeospue, the arena is self-destructing, so you have 1 minute to get to the spacesuits and jump out.

Bonus Level - Outer Wonders

  • Explore space in all of its beauty
  • To get from place to place, use teleporters found on asteroids.
  • Fight Aliens

Notes:

  • There will be items exclusive to this DLC decided by Mojang Studios.
  • Other Mobs will be decided by Mojang Studios.

Story: Begining + Levels 1 & 2

A shard has flown all the way into outer space! Well... not exactly. An alien who was disguised as a human scientist found it on the ground in front of a launch center. Like the Arch-Illeger, he wasn't allowed in. He got corrupted by his greed and desired revenge! He took over the launch center, making everybody there into zombie scientist, that only work for him! He was a nice guy even for an alien, but there's no going back now...

The Shard Tracker showed that a shard was over by the lab on another island, however... the tracker soon loses track of the shard. So you go over there to find a launch center. You realize that the shard went into space. However, you quickly find out that there are zombie scientists here. Whether you want to sneak around or attack is your choice. Once you get to the control panel, you turn on the launch sequence and race to the rocket before it launches.

It seems like the course for the rocket was heading towards the I.S.S. You head there only to find out that it's been corrupted by the alien. The Astro-mobs await you, and they're NOT happy. It seems like the shard is not here, so to prevent the Astro-mobs from getting to earth, you turn on self-destruct mode, and rush to the escape pods.

Story: Level 3 + Bonus Level

The course for the pod is the O.S.S. On your way there, you get ambushed by mutant mobs! It seems like the alien has been working. After you survived the ambush and head into the O.S.S, you head through it to fight the alien, which you learn his corrupted name. Horrific Hixeospue. After you get to him, you fight, only to be going farther & farther into space. While battling him,  the self destruct sequence activates, and you have just enough time to defeat him, put on the astronaut suit, and get out of there! From there, you can find your way to earth.

Or...

You can explore space in all of its wonders. See the beautiful things of outer space. After all of your space adventure is done, you use the final teleporter to teleport back to the launch center.
What about amour, weapons, bows/crossbows, artifacts, cunsombols?
no
So like stud magnet in lego games.
What?! Why? They are perfectly useful as-is!

Adding on to the idea:
- Crafting Table in Camp
- Craft your own arrows from Flint, Sticks, and Feather drops from mobs.
This sounds fun
I love the idea but I feel like Mojang won't really add any more DLCs after they finished the story with The End DLC. Shame though cuz id love to see this
Pls vote, it would be amazing!!
also some way to make new mobs, perhaps with a scratch-like very basic programming language
I like that idea, but I think you should pay money to get it. it could be dlc. but instead of you getting more levels, you would make them.
YES. It would be SO COOL to make your own maps, maybe using normal minecraft?
custom maps and custom arenas (with limited or endless waves), the host creates the level and other players download it (even on console) before actually starting the level.
I think of making my DLC [Trumbling skys] a free DLC...but it needs votes if anything...

The wandering trader should come occasionally to the camp, and wander around the camp, too. You can't attack him, though. The trader should also be back because every time you go to camp, it shows a wandering trader. But why would they show him if he isn't there anymore?

I think the item level for time-limited items should be higher more often than normal loot. Doing a rank III Spooky Trial says item levels went up to 174. I did a LOT of them and only got two 173 items. The rest were 169-172. In normal gameplay that you can farm indefinitely this is acceptable. In a time-limited event this is extremely disappointing. More importantly, we should be able to pause in singleplayer (or couch co-op if friend is in inventory), and we should be able to play when our internet goes out.

I feel that the uniques that dropped should have varied from day to to day, instead of being the same 4 over and over again. Doing it like that would mean that people who are very busy and dont have much time to play the event, have a better chance to get hold of the uniques they wanted. I'd also like to see some uniques be unique to levels since thats intresting and provides a variety of different challenges for players. Also a difficulty slider would be appreciated, as we all want high level gear without having to break the bank at the blacksmith upgrading everything. Finally, some more truly 'unique' items would be nice, ones with different effects, rather than a re-skin of previous items. I understand that reskins are good because it means that players have a chance to have practically the same gear as those who took the event trials, and not put the 'event people' at an advantage. However, some seasonal effects might be nice to provide some motive to get rarer pieces of gear. ( for example : mobs glow in night mode). Thanks for reading :)
fix the site i tell you
was great but keep on lost the connected on the game
Very Good although I inly got the armour because I am am quite new to the game and I would like to see a difficulty bar loke all main missons. Thank You for making such a great game.

I love minecraft dungeon and the halloween mission was really nice, but new level of apocalypse are unplayable. Its not possible that with 172 power level one player cant win a 161 power level raccomended. Please fix the game that in this way is really broken. Thank you!

I highly enjoyed the event and the item re-skins included in it. The only thing that I believe could have been improved on was the length of the event. I feel that it would have been better if it had lasted the majority of or at least half of October. Besides this, there was nothing else I would have changed.

I think it would be cool to decorate the camp for holiday events, maybe for Christmas it is snowing and there are Christmas trees! Also Apocalypse+ needs to be fixed. It's way too hard even for an upgrade Apocalypse difficulty. But I do love this game, so keep up the great work!

I enjoyed it, but the loot was the same each day. It'd've been cooler if there was a range of limited-time hear you could collect with each trial. Speaking of, I believe it would be interesting to see custom limited-time levels for each season (e.g. a Halloween event where the level is a graveyard theme, with a giant skeleton as a final boss or something.) Or, kinda like what the past event was, levels that relate to the holiday can have alternate trials with new bosses or mobs to fight (e.g. Frosted Fjord is decorated in a Christmas style and has a Grinch or some other evil entity as a boss. Maybe some mobs can wear Santa hats.)
There should also be Christmas, Easter, or 4th of July events too!
i want artifact uniqes of firework arrow and totem of shielding. as those are my main artifacts. not saying you shouldnt do others either!

I think it was a splendid event. I would though, like to suggest a few things.
For starters, the gear given is a little too overpowered in terms of power level in default difficulty (seems like the opposite in adventure and apocalypse). Next, the enchantments are quite lackluster. Third, I think there needs to be a sort of new equipment given.
Thanks first three event though, hope to see more in the future.

@Hayden Spence, I do not think fourth of July events areas a good thing. For starters, it seems that the day is an American specific one. I hope you are aware that there are other countries with their own independance days. The other suggestions though have some credibility

I liked the unique rewards and thought the challenge was good, maybe there should be more unique artefacts following the same lines as the Corrupted Pumpkin, I also liked the shape and colour of the weapons but maybe if the event was a bit longer it would have been more fun because we would have had more time to gather all the different items.

posted on behalf of my son.

The power of the uniques were great, but I think there should've been more rewards to get from the trials, because once I got the Hungry Horror, Haunted Bow, and the Corrupted Pumpkin, I stopped playing the Spooky Trials because I already had the rewards.
I do wonder if Mojang will do a Christmas theme as they did for Halloween...maybe they will...
There is a chills and thrills event starting on Dec. 18th. It's like the spooky fall event.

I would love in town decorations. Why not have cobwebs and pumpkins in the home town! That would be super cool! 

ALSO there should be a badge to say that I participated in the event! I wanna remember it and have a history of participation in the game!
Can there be Easter event please.
I think all the items should return again
Please make it possible to receive cosmetic rewards from the past event in the next year's event by also adding new rewards, but not taking away the opportunity to receive old ones!
I definitely think not! Re-rolling it's enchantments? That would be so over-powered.

I don't think it should re-roll the enchants, this is what the grindstone would do:

  • It is in the lobby/camp, and it costs emeralds to use
  • It removes the enchantment points from an already-enchanted item and gives you back the item and the points
  • You must complete a mission before using the grindstone
  • You can only give it enchanted items

The grindstone might also be with a merchant of some kind.

Yeah, if it re-rolls enchantments it would be extremely overpowered but like the other guy said it should be able to give you back enchantment points (de-enchant) on a piece of gear (like in Minecraft). Probably for emeralds but they might find a use for putting that scrapped diamond dust into the game as the cost.
Please get this updated - i play ever arpg with qwer keys.... extremely annoying!
I love the game it's osom
A restart button would be great! It takes a long time for the 'traveling to camp' screen to load....
terrific idea!!!
And a longer time to load the level

maybe the heart of ender artifact should be renamed to the orb of dominance or a shard of the orb of dominance or something similar and instead of being death cap mushroom ++ it should have the laser blasts in all directions rotating around like the heart of ender boss does but I definitely like this idea
Well, this would kind of negate the story, because the orb is supposed to corrupt any of it's users.
Yeah, I can agree with this from game experience. The bosses should have their own unique gear drops, so that the fight is actually worth doing.
I don't think the orb of dominance is a good idea because your trying to destroy it, right? But the rest is a good idea.
Or salvage in bulk by selecting multiple items

This is a solid suggestion to encourage interaction between versions. This encourages play when you encounter the arcade version, and purchase of the console version. We finally bought dungeons for the console, but, had the cards worked as indicated, we would have bought the same day we played the arcade, for sure.
First time playing the arcade game today.. i almost went home bought the dungeon's game on xbox bur found out they are not the same version

This is so true... I have five of the arcade cards, yet there is no code to redeem them in game. The reason I event played the arcade version was to get the cards to get items in game, now I am just disappointed.
I really loved going to the arcade so
YES MOJANG PLEASE ADD THIS
Maybe new mob, the Silver Golem who throws sharp silver shards like boomerangs.

Some more features: 

-replace the emerald bundles with emerald ores

-add gold ores so player can collect some gold

-pointed dripstone can fall anywhere in the Dripstone Death and Dripstone Cave

-glowing squid

-glowing berries increase consumer's vision (recognize mobs, chest, etc)

-parkour on dripleaf

-some ideas for gear: gears related to amethyst, mineral, lush caves, deep dark biomes

-lightning rod artifact (the bronze one in Minecraft): You place down a lightning rod, the lightning bolt will strikes every 2 seconds in an area

-a Miner at your camp:

   +It can be unlocked by rescue the village from this DLC's certain level 

   +How it works: Player requires the Miner to start working in one of three DLC's level -> The Miner falls into a trouble at that cave (because the mobs :) ) -> Rescue the Miner and complete that level -> Back to the camp and claim the rewards at the Miner

   +Potential rewards (Order of possibility): Emerald, gold, common gears, rare gears (can be unique if player is equipping the luck of the sea enchanted gear), unique gears, gilded gears (only possible at maximized Miner's level) 

   +Players can upgrade the Miner with enchantment points
I would like that because I collect uniques and I would love to have all my different artifacts to stay at the top good idea

Definitely, even just a grindstone like in the normal game would be great for when I put gravity on my melee but then realise you've already got it on your armour. Even if you have to pay emeralds for disenchant and more for reroll this would still be worth it.
I like the Enchantment Reroll idea. At least keep the Blacksmith because he not only remove enchantments he also highers the power level but ad removal shop too.

I completely agree with this idea. The blacksmith already undos enchantments when he upgrades items. I think that he should have two other options. Re-roll: which would cost one enchantment point and a number of emeralds, and Enchant removal: which disenchants the armor piece for a number of emeralds. I also think that if this was added, then upgrading armor should not remove enchants, but keep them on.

Definetly, I was thinking with my friends about this. But I'll add one single thing: either you reroll the enchantment slots (all 3 at once) for a number of emeralds, or you reroll one single slot for a bigger number of emeralds, or you select which enchantment you want, for a very large amount of emeralds (5k for example). That would be so great because if I need an exact enchantment, I may need several rerolls to get it, and I think it could be faster obtaining another item.
Yea, and the boss could be like a corrupted Revenger. That would be COOL

Gear: 

Artifacts>  Horn of rage 

Bows/Crossbow> Captain's crossbow

Armor> Armor of the mansion,(Uniqe)   Village amor
They already kind of did this they have a woodland mansion ancient hunt now
heck yeaa (and its ravanger) or evoker lord
It would be so useful if it refreshed your enchantments too.
Great idea.
LIMITED TIME ITEMS!
This is really necessary, since I've had my sisters place an item in that I didn't want to put in when I walked away from the controller for a moment
Yeah..good idea i want this in the game
This would be a nice feature, like once a day or somthing. i lost an important item because i need to unlock adventure but that item was my most powerful so now i cant in the first place.

Yess, I put my weapon into the slot and had no idea that I wouldn't be able to take it out, it didn't warn me before hand, and I have to play the whole game basically to get it back, which is ridiculous

I actually like this idea. Maybe it would be more of a concentration camp like thing. Maybe there are villagers going around doing things for the Illagers and you have to save them. Good idea though, it would defiantly make a good secret level.
That would make it unique

have you heard of the secret level called Arch Haven? best way to describe it is a pillager outpost level with a small touch of pirate aesthetic to it.

 

Though the concept for a level is interesting. Could be used to make another level!
